column3: Pictures deface walls more often than they decorate them.
The artist who aims at perfection in everything achieves it in nothing.
Art depends on luck and talent.
That's the motivation of an artist - to seek attention of some kind.
The modern artist is working with space and time, and expressing his feelings rather than illustrating.
Trying to force creativity is never good.
If you know somethin' well, you can always paint it but people would be better off buyin' chickens.
The best artists know what to leave out.
I do not want art for a few any more than education for a few, or freedom for a few.
I think an artist's responsibility is more complex than people realize.
Art is the daughter of freedom.
I don't believe in art. I believe in artists.
Every human is an artist. The dream of your life is to make beautiful art.
I rarely draw what I see. I draw what I feel in my body.
I never know what I'm going to put on the canvas. The canvas paints itself. I'm just the middleman.
Culture is the arts elevated to a set of beliefs.
Art is the most beautiful of all lies.
My attitude towards drawing is not necessarily about drawing. It's about making the best kind of image I can make, it's about talking as clearly as I can.
I realize that protest paintings are not exactly in vogue, but I've done many.
I was the least Pop of all the Pop artists.
Art is Art. Everything else is everything else.
Artists themselves are not confined, but their output is.
I like to pretend that my art has nothing to do with me.
Art doesn't transform. It just plain forms.
Of what use were the arts if they were only the reproduction and the imitation of life?
I decided on the spot that I would be an artist, and I assure you, it was no ordinary artist I had in mind.
